app.name: Woo Subscription Viewer
app.short_description: View Woo subscription + latest order details inside Zendesk.
app.long_description: Shows pre-synced WooCommerce subscription + latest order data for the ticket requester. Read-only. Includes refresh and syncing states.
app.installation_instructions: Install the app, set api_endpoint (your backend base URL), then open any ticket.
